entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
